title: Israel Rebels and Is Judged
summary: Numbers 14 shows the people rejecting God’s promise and rebelling in fear. God threatens to destroy them, but Moses intercedes. God forgives but declares that the current generation will not enter the Promised Land except Caleb and Joshua.

faq.question: What was Israel’s response to the spies’ report?
faq.answer: They wept, complained, and wanted to return to Egypt, showing a lack of faith.

faq.question: What was God’s judgment?
faq.answer: Everyone 20 years and older would die in the wilderness over 40 years of wandering.
